name: Minty Meat Rolls
title: Minty Meat Rolls
desc: Though this might be its current form, think about it for a moment: did this dish first start as mint rolled around meat, or meat rolled around mint?

skills.desc: Before this Round ends, the target character's next 3 Normal Attacks cost 1 less Unaligned Element. (A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)
